title: NextFilm
text: Movie application I developed using NextJS and Tailwind CSS.

title: AnimeDB App
text: My AnimeDB project that I developed with React and Tailwind CSS using Jikan API.

title: News App
text: News website I developed using React and Tailwind CSS with the help of The New York Times API.

title: Ecommerce App
text: I used Firebase to set up the Authentication structure, Axios to get the data from the API, and Redux Toolkit for State Management.

title: Architecture Website
text: Responsive clone architecture site I made with React and Tailwind CSS.

title: Pokedex App
text: I used POKEAPI for the api. You can learn many information about pokemon by typing the name of the pokemon you want in the search section

title: Rick and Morty App
text: I used POKEAPI for the api. You can learn many information about pokemon by typing the name of the pokemon you want in the search section

title: Cafe Website
text: Clone cafe site that I developed with React and Tailwind CSS.

title: Money Spending App
text: In this app, you can buy things from the market by spending Elon Musk's money. You can see your purchases in the receipt section at the bottom.

title: Covid19 Turkey Data
text: This application helps us to see the Covid 19 statistics in Turkey. I specified the start and end date. You can see the number of tests, the number of cases and the number of deaths on the desired date.

title: Steakhouse Website
text: Responsive restaurant website that I developed with React and Tailwind CSS
